website_summaries.verdict: This Bulova watch has looks and functions that stand out among the pack – a gorgeous watch that you will find practical to wear everyday.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for the combination of rose gold-tone casing, deep brown leather strap, and white face that creates an interesting look
Has a sweeping second hand and date window
cons: Some owners like the locking buckle fastener, but others found it awkward to open and close

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Strap took a while to figure out how it works. Had to wind it everyday in the beginning. It's smaller than I expected. Issue with Kings watches when I tried to return it. Must be in brand new condition to return and get your money back, small strap broke off first week I had it so that's out. Guess I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: LORETTA MCEACHARN

customer_reviews.title: because the size is pretty small, but considering whom the watch is for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old daughter and I made the mistake of not reading it carefully, because the size is pretty small, but considering whom the watch is for. I loved it. It is small but it is a piece of art, and the Butterfly clasp in the back is awesome.. I just hope my daughter will keep it forever. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Marco Villatoro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quartz Movement Watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, and seems well made. The leather band is a subtle croco pattern and I like that the stitching matches the band color. It was simple to set the time and date, but figuring out the bracelet band was a bit more complicated. I just wish that Bulova had more ladies automatic movements available in this price range, as that was what I really had been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: kelseybobelsey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, small
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my GF and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Littledragon

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday watch.
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful everyday watch. Took a bit of time to learn how to fasten and an fasten it because of the clasp closure. As most date leeping watches, it took a bit of time to get to the proper date, but having the date proves worth it. Has a three year manufacturer's warranty. Just a great looking watch that I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cec D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch. I had to go get fast-track Doctoral ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. I had to go get fast-track Doctoral degrees in Physics and Mechanical Engineering just so I could figure out the clasp. Now that I've mastered that contraption...I feel ready to take on the issues plaguing the International Space Station! But, yes, it's a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough watch but disappointed with the color of the face
customer_reviews.text: We returned this watch because my wife did not particularly like the cream-colored face. I had purchased the men's version for myself and she very much liked the brown face, as did I. Too bad Bulova doesn't make a women's version with the same brown dial as they do for men.
customer_reviews.author: DrJerry

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I expected a nice watch and instead received a knock-out gorgeous watch. Beautiful design set off by rose gold case. Only complaint is with band. I find the clasp awkward. I do like the leather band and will probably become more at ease with clasp with practice. Bottom line: I feel so fortunate to have ordered this watch. The photo does not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: savi

customer_reviews.title: NICE WATCH WITH AKWARD CLASP MECHANISM
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch, but the clasp mechanism is a pain, especially so as it has two loops to hold down the band, the first of which is fixed in place and very close to the clasp. This makes it quite fiddly to put on. My wife did not find that to be a ritual she wanted to go through daily, so I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander White

customer_reviews.title: THIS WATCH IS GORGEOUS AND I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous watch. It does everything it is suppose to do, it keeps accurate time. It also looks great going casual or dressy. The watch is also very stylish. I am so very glad the watch was available. I just love it. I have another Bulova that I bought from Amazon and It is equally as wonderful. I could not be more happy with my beautiful watch. It sells retail at other places for $400.00. I feel very fortunate buying this watch for the price that I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Carmickle

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! It's beautiful, the bracelet clasp is really nice makes it easy on and off. It's at a great price, I say it's a must buy! It would make a great gift for the watch lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: M. Seiter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My latest favorite, and I'm very happy with the watch! It doesn't take long to figure out the clasp at all! Pretty straight forward!
customer_reviews.author: F. S. M. Salie

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my wife and it is a beautiful timepiece. I like the way the second hand "sweeps" instead of ticks. Good value for the money. The wife really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is my new favorite! I would definitely buy another
customer_reviews.text: I have 30 watches, this is my new favorite! I would definitely buy another. Quality, beautiful, classic design, love it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures don't do it justice. Very easy to read dial.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking exactly for a watch that was rose gold with a leather band. This was a perfect match for her. The sweeping hand adds class to the already amazing looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: NiteQwill

customer_reviews.title: Very rich and promoting.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is rich looking and heads turn to look at it. It also the same model as mine that i purchased on the explorer of the seas.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Winiarski

customer_reviews.title: The second hand has continuous movement which I like. The gold clasp with the Bulova emblem on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very classy looking watch. I wear a brown blazer at work and the watch compliments my outfit. The second hand has continuous movement which I like. The gold clasp with the Bulova emblem on it is very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I don't have tiny wrists so this watch looks great on me - unlike some other watches with really small faces. The face is a little larger and is super pretty and classy. The rose gold is beautiful and the band is so well-made. I'm very happy with it and the precisionist style is a great bonus. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sobeachbebi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected from Bulova. Bought for the wife for Valentine's Day gift... she loves it! Great price only available from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: Great at the current price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Time Piece, bought as a gift, and she loved it. At the price I paid ($120) it is amazing, considering it has a $400 MSRP
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful and elegant. Very comfortable. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute perfect .... I recommend .... I love it.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID P.NORWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy :)
customer_reviews.text: Lovely watch. Simple, classy and the sweeping second hand is a nice touch. I'd read in earlier reviews how the watch strap closure was complicated- it was a bit (hint-the buckle part flips back), but once done, it's done and becomes like a metal bracelet closure. You can do this! Looked elsewhere online for exact same watch- found it for over $100 more. This was an Amazon open box deal. Perfect, free shipping, arriving on day stated.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: beautiful watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoy looking at it and am glad i spoiled myself for my birthday. though with the great amazon pricing, it was a manageable splurge. :-) the clasp mechanism does take a couple days to get used to, but once you learn how to work it, it takes no longer than closing a regular watch strap.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch but very weird band
customer_reviews.text: The watch is nice except the band has a very bizarre design that is difficult to use. It looks fine, but what you can't see is that there is a metal clasp that attaches to the leather band and this is what you use to put the watch on and take the watch off. It just doesn't work very well unless you have three hands. I honestly can't imagine why anyone would design a watch band like this. Much as I like the watch, I will probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely stunning! The price is good, and you still get the quality expected from Bulova. The clasp is different- you would expect your average band...but you get an actual clasp. I appreciate the claps because it keeps my watch safe and it is comfortable. This quickly became my "go to" watch.
customer_reviews.author: MSDubya

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: i already 2 bulova watches with silver bands which i love and my birthday was coming up so i started looking for something with a leather band and came upon this one, well my husband ordered it and on my birthday gave it to me and when i opened it i screamed so loud in delight my husband was smiling ear to ear, what i am saying is the picture doesnt do it justice, it is absolutely beautiful and my husband loved it and he is really picky!! hope this helps : )
customer_reviews.author: elaine

product_meta.title: Bulova Women's 97M104 Precisionist Longwood Rose-Tone Brown Leather Watch
product_meta.description:
The most accurate watch in the world with a continuously sweeping second hand. In stainless steel with rose-gold finish, domed metalized crystal, multiple-layer silver-white, silver and rose-gold dial, continuously sweeping second hand, luminous hands, calendar, padded and stitched dark brown leather strap, locking deployment buckle and water resistance to 30 meters. Duet: 97B110




In 1875, a young Czech immigrant named Joseph Bulova set up shop in New York City, and a legendary American watch brand was born. Bulova was trained as a jeweler, and his expertise carried over into his watchmaking career, which began around 1911 with boudoir clocks and pocket watches, and soon evolved to include what was then one of the latest and most fashionable technological innovations: the wristwatch.

 Bulova introduced its first line of wristwatches in 1919. The company grew and prospered, and soon early radio and television ads were declaring, "America runs on Bulova time." In the 1950s, continuing its legacy of innovation, Bulova introduced Accutron, the first electronic watch, and the first breakthrough in timekeeping technology in over 300 years. The Accutron timing mechanism was later adapted for use by NASA computers and a Bulova timer was even placed on the moon to control transmissions of data. Bulova timepieces have kept official time aboard Air Force One and have also served as official timepieces for U.S. Olympic teams.

 Today, Bulova maintains its tradition of excellence in technology and design, offering a diverse collection of beautiful precision timepieces for every occasion.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6 x 6 x 7 inches; 1 Pounds
 * Item model number :97M104
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :January 1, 2009
 * Manufacturer :Bulova
 * ASIN :B003P1MRZM

Duet: 97B110




In 1875, a young Czech immigrant named Joseph Bulova set up shop in New York City, and a legendary American watch brand was born. Bulova was trained as a jeweler, and his expertise carried over into his watchmaking career, which began around 1911 with boudoir clocks and pocket watches, and soon evolved to include what was then one of the latest and most fashionable technological innovations: the wristwatch.

 Bulova introduced its first line of wristwatches in 1919. The company grew and prospered, and soon early radio and television ads were declaring, "America runs on Bulova time." In the 1950s, continuing its legacy of innovation, Bulova introduced Accutron, the first electronic watch, and the first breakthrough in timekeeping technology in over 300 years. The Accutron timing mechanism was later adapted for use by NASA computers and a Bulova timer was even placed on the moon to control transmissions of data. Bulova timepieces have kept official time aboard Air Force One and have also served as official timepieces for U.S. Olympic teams.

 Today, Bulova maintains its tradition of excellence in technology and design, offering a diverse collection of beautiful precision timepieces for every occasion.
feature_bullets: Domed mineral crystal with rose gold metalized rim; Beveled dauphine hands with flat tip and tail, luminous filled middle
Stainless steel case and brown leather strap
Water resistant to 99 feet (30 M): withstands rain and splashes of water, but not showering or submersion
